body.name: TheraBreath Healthy Gums Mouthwash, Clean Mint, Antigingivitis, Dentist Formulated, 16 Fl Oz (2-Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 52 mins
features: PERIODONTAL MOUTHWASH: Helps fight gingivitis, an early form of gum disease and bleeding gums, for 24 hours when used as directed
DENTIST FORMULATED: Dr. Katz created the TheraBreath formulas in 1993 to help his own daughter with her bad breath
ALCOHOL FREE: Non-burning formula made without alcohol that starts working instantly
RESTORE CONFIDENCE: TheraBreath believes you should define success any way you please. We exist to motivate you to go get it!
IT'S A BETTER MOUTHWASH: Try the #1 fastest growing mouthwash brand in the USA (data on file)
body.description: According to the CDC, 50% of adult Americans are living with gum disease. Gum disease can cause sensitive or bleeding gums. Advanced gum disease can even lead to tooth loss. Fortunately, TheraBreath Healthy Gums Mouthwash reduces occurrence of gum disease and bleeding gums so you can keep your pearly whites. Fortified with the periodontist recommended ingredient CPC, an FDA-approved ingredient clinically shown to help fight gingivitis, this oral rinse helps control the plaque that leads to gingivitis and bleeding gums. TheraBreath Healthy Gums Mouthwash is dentist formulated to help freshen breath with an alcohol-free formula doesn't burn or irritate. We’re so confident in the effectiveness of TheraBreath Oral Rinses that we back them up with our 100% guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. TheraBreath: It's a better mouthwash, satisfaction 100% guaranteed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a life saver
reviews.reviewText: I am pregnant with my second child and my gums started being super sensitive and didn't help I had morning sickness every single day. I use this combined with the Crest enamel and gum repair and my gums have never been this healthy before. My routine is flossing, brushing, tongue scraper and finish off with the mouth rinse. I do not drink or eat for 30 minutes after. Rinse and repeat AM and PM. I AM NOT A DENTIST NOR A HYGIENIST. THIS ROUTINE IS WHTA WORKS FOR ME. This really sealed the deal in helping my gums look and feel healthier. Will purchase again once I'm close of running out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I hate mouthwash but...
reviews.reviewText: I really don't care for mouthwash but realized after using a bottle of this stuff that my gums looked a lot healthier. The flavor is mild enough that you don't mind using it but still does its job really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this mouthwash a bit over 6 months & I absolutely love it. This is my favorite flavor & I do think it helps my gums. Thanks to my friend for recommending me this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash is the best I have ever used. Just enough little burn to feel it is really helping your gums. I used it after every meal and my mouth feels so clean all day. Sometimes you just can't brush but you can rinse your mouth quickly and it feels so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well initially, then it seems to lose its effectiveness
reviews.reviewText: I had this on subscription for about a year. It worked well in reducing my bad breath for the first two months I think, continued to use it in the hope that it'll continue to work. But my bad breath returned after that first two months. So I have moved on to something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very gentle, but feels like it works.
reviews.reviewText: My mouth tissue is pretty sensitive, so I’ve never been able to use a mouthwash regularly…. Until now. I love that it is very gentle, and my mouth feels very clean after using TheraBreath mouthwash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouthwash I Can Use
reviews.reviewText: This is one of a few mouthwashes that I can actually use. Most store over the counter mouthwashes burn my mouth when I use them, but Therabreath is one I can use without a problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TheraBreath Healthy Gums Mouthwash, Clean Mint, Antigingivitis, Dentist Formulated, 16 Fl Oz
reviews.reviewText: I recently started using TheraBreath Healthy Gums Mouthwash in the Clean Mint flavor, and it has quickly become a go-to choice for maintaining oral health. Here's my review based on my experience with the double pack:Pros:Effective Antigingivitis Formula:TheraBreath's Healthy Gums Mouthwash is dentist-formulated with an antigingivitis formula. It provides effective support for gum health, which is essential for overall oral care.Clean Mint Flavor:The Clean Mint flavor is refreshing without being overpowering. It leaves a clean and pleasant taste in the mouth, making it a suitable choice for regular use.Convenient Double Pack:The double pack is a thoughtful and convenient option. Having two bottles allows for versatility, such as keeping one at home and sending the other with your husband on-the-road (OTR). It ensures consistent use in different settings.Subscription Option:Opting for a subscription adds an extra layer of convenience. Knowing that the product will be delivered regularly eliminates the need to worry about running out and provides a hassle-free solution.Economical Savings:Purchasing the double pack as part of a subscription proves to be more economical than buying individual bottles in-store. This can result in cost savings over time, making it a budget-friendly choice.Dentist-Recommended Brand:TheraBreath is a brand known for dentist-formulated oral care products. The fact that it's dentist-recommended adds a level of trust and confidence in the product's effectiveness.Cons:Preference for Different Flavors:While the Clean Mint flavor is well-received, some users might prefer a variety of flavors. Exploring different options within the TheraBreath range could cater to diverse preferences.Overall Impression:TheraBreath Healthy Gums Mouthwash in Clean Mint is a reliable choice for maintaining oral hygiene, and the double pack with a subscription option enhances its convenience. The refreshing flavor, combined with the dentist-formulated antigingivitis formula, creates a positive user experience.I recommend TheraBreath Healthy Gums Mouthwash to those who prioritize gum health and enjoy the benefits of a clean mint flavor. The subscription model, offering economical savings and consistent supply, makes it a practical choice for maintaining a healthy oral care routine at home and on-the-go. I look forward to exploring different flavors within the TheraBreath range in the future.
i really liked the flavor and feeling afterwards definitely the best mouthwash out there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Worst experience... I previously buyer this product. It was amazing but this time it just does the reverse. Now my condition is critical with using this product. Also the product is different with what I used in 2017... Never buy this product again
Sin exagerar, vas a notar sus efectos desde la primera vez que lo uses. Eso sí, cuesta por lo menos dos veces más que un enjuague convencional, pero vale mucho la pena.
Received the item in good condition. Yet to try the product.Hope it works well. Didnt realize the bottle was big. But worth the moneyThank you Seller
